name: FIFA Street 3
summary:
An update of its previous incarnation, this next-gen update features over 250 of the top International players as well as a few legends who can be unlocked, each with their own attribute such as Tricksters (players who can confuse others and pull off difficult moves), Enforcers (who can take as much punishment as they can dish out), Playmakers (who can turn the tide of a game), and Finishers (who become a major player towards an end of the game).

It also features the Game Breaker meter where the player can pull off certain difficult shots, filling it and using it to pull off more complicated trick shots. It features a Street Challenge mode where players can enroll in tournaments to unlock new players and locales or go head-to-head against a human opponent.

There is also online capabilities where the player can build their own World Cup team and compete in tournaments as well as create their own home courts and share with friends online. There is also a new control scheme, utilizing the analog stick combining it with certain button combinations to pull of certain trick shots and has exotic locales to play in such as South America, Asia and Europe in locations such as streets, rooftops and playgrounds to compete in.
